about.summary: Gibbs sampler for fitting multivariate Bayesian linear regression with shrinkage priors (MBSP), using the three parameter beta normal family. The method is described in Bai and Ghosh (2018) <doi:10.1016/j.jmva.2018.04.010>.

Gibbs sampler for fitting multivariate Bayesian linear regression with shrinkage priors (MBSP), using the three parameter beta normal family. The method is described in Bai and Ghosh (2018) <doi:10.1016/j.jmva.2018.04.010>.

name: r-mbsp
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '4.0' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-mbsp
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/MBSP_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/MBSP/MBSP_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: cb0d0da0e5542155d3731af5575ec7b46ad69aed7aa7cafc31759821eaf4d2e5

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 2
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-gigrvg
    - r-mcmcpack
    - r-mvtnorm
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-gigrvg
    - r-mcmcpack
    - r-mvtnorm

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('MBSP')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('MBSP')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=MBSP
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Gibbs sampler for fitting multivariate Bayesian linear regression with shrinkage priors
    (MBSP), using the three parameter beta normal family. The method is described in
    Bai and Ghosh (2018) <doi:10.1016/j.jmva.2018.04.010>.
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: MBSP
# Type: Package
# Title: Multivariate Bayesian Model with Shrinkage Priors
# Version: 4.0
# Date: 2023-05-17
# Author: Ray Bai, Malay Ghosh
# Maintainer: Ray Bai <raybaistat@gmail.com>
# Description: Gibbs sampler for fitting multivariate Bayesian linear regression with shrinkage priors (MBSP), using the three parameter beta normal family. The method is described in Bai and Ghosh (2018) <doi:10.1016/j.jmva.2018.04.010>.
# License: GPL-3
# Depends: R (>= 3.6.0)
# Imports: stats, MCMCpack, GIGrvg, utils, mvtnorm
# NeedsCompilation: yes
# Packaged: 2023-05-17 20:40:50 UTC; rayba
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2023-05-17 21:00:03 UTC
